thread.title: Canada court says Chevron can be pursued there over Ecuador damage
thread.title_full: Canada court says Chevron can be pursued there over Ecuador damage - San Francisco Chronicle

author: New York Times
title: Canada court says Chevron can be pursued there over Ecuador damage
text: The Supreme Court of Canada has ruled that a group of Ecuadorans can use an Ontario court in an attempt to collect billions of dollars from Chevron for environmental damage.
